StringSet.String:
Thank you for your purchase of this Logitech product. Logitech products are designed to help you use your PC more effectively. Take advantage of enhanced product features by installing this software.
When you are ready to begin installation of this Logitech software product, please select your language and press the Next button.
Sorry, this software is not compatible with your operating system. Please visit www.logitech.com to download a compatible version.
This version of the installer requires a 32-bit edition of your operating system.\nPlease visit www.logitech.com/downloads/Solar App to download a compatible version.
This version of the installer requires a 64-bit edition of your operating system.\nPlease visit www.logitech.com/downloads/Solar App to download a compatible version.
